statements: DELETE FROM FarmManagement WHERE id = 1 AND field_id = 100
DELETE FROM FarmManagement WHERE schedule_time < '2022-12-31 00:00:00' AND water_usage > 100
DELETE FROM water_usage WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM Field WHERE field_id = 'dcf3c82e-97f7-45d0-a47c-48c59b763189' AND farm_id = 'f2f34746-2679-4859-9a76-411f94c00772';
DELETE FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE farm_id = 2 AND duration_minutes < 30;
DELETE FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE farm_id = 3 AND duration_minutes > 30;
